pages.text: There is much that lies hidden in the forests and plains, at the tops of mountains and the bottom of oceans.$(br2)In all of these expanses of nature, the Druid strives to learn all that they can about the world, and in these experiences learn how to manipulate nature in wondrous ways.

To begin, start by breaking some tall grass. Look for $(info) $(l:herbs/wildroot)Wildroot$() and Terra Spores, with which you can grow $(l:herbs/terra_moss)Terra Moss$(), to begin your own journey.$(br2)There are a number of other $(l:basics/resources)essential resources$() that you may gather along the way, and if, at any time, you find yourself "stuck", $(l:basics/letter)you may wish to read the letter included in this guide$().
